data:
spec:
  execution:
    steps:
    - step:
        name: "ServiceNow Approval"
        identifier: serviceNowApproval
        type: ServiceNowApproval
        timeout: 1d
        spec:
          approvalCriteria:
            type: KeyValues
            spec:
              matchAnyCondition: false
              conditions: []
          rejectionCriteria:
            type: KeyValues
            spec:
              matchAnyCondition: false
              conditions: []
